content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am always in a panic when I hear someone talking around me. Are they really talking about me?

I can definitely understand how that could make you feel. A lot of people tend to think that they' re talking about someone else when in reality, and they are not, but you can tell by the way you respond that it really is someone else.
Good choice. I will give it a try next time.
I have been there myself. It' s definitely been good to talk to you. Try to focus on yourself instead of what is going on around you, and see how you feel at the time.
